API name: Climate FieldView Platform REST API v4.0.11
Description:
The Climate FieldView Platform API retrieves crop performance in agricultural fields, based on climate conditions. Manage argonomic data such as field boundries, field data, resource owner, and farm organization data.
Use Jason Web Token to authenticate and make calls in JSON format.
Climate Fieldview provides crop performance analysis, field health imagery, variable rate prescriptions, fertility management, data connectivity, and data visualization for farms.
